article: the canadian government fined air transat dlrs ###,### canadian -lrb- dlrs ###,### u.s. -rrb- on thursday and imposed more restrictions on its fleet after the airline admitted mechanics installed improper equipment on a plane that lost power over the atlantic ocean .
